provision_password.description: Password required during OS provisioning for root users. Length must be at least 8 characters and must not contain commas (,), hyphens (-), single quotes ('), or double quotes (\").

postgresdb_password.description: Password required for PostgreSQL database. Length must be at least 8 characters and must contain only alphanumeric characters (letters and numbers).

bmc_username.description: Username for BMC (idrac) access. The same credentials must be used across all servers.

bmc_password.description: Password required for BMC (idrac) access. Length must be at least 3 characters and must not contain commas (,), hyphens (-), single quotes ('), or double quotes (\").

switch_snmp3_username.description: Non-admin SNMPv3 credentials for the PXE switch. If multiple switches are provided, use the same credentials for all switches.

switch_snmp3_password.description: Password required for SNMPv3 access to the PXE switch. Must not contain commas (,), hyphens (-), single quotes ('), or double quotes (\").

pulp_password.description: Pulp required for setting up Pulp container. Length must be at least 8 characters and must not contain commas (,), hyphens (-), single quotes ('), or double quotes (\").

docker_username.description: Username for Dockerhub account. This will be used for Docker login.

docker_password.description: Password for Dockerhub account. Must be at least 8 characters long and can contain letters, numbers, and special characters.

slurm_db_password.description: SlurmDB password must not contain special characters like hyphens (-), single quotes ('), double quotes (") or backslashes (\).

directory_manager_password.description: Password for LDAP Directory Manager. Must not contain hyphens (-), single quotes ('), double quotes ("), at symbols (@), or backslashes (\).

kerberos_admin_password.description: Password for Kerberos admin in FreeIPA. Must not contain hyphens (-), single quotes ('), double quotes ("), at symbols (@), or backslashes (\).

openldap_db_username.description: Username for OpenLDAP database admin. Must not contain semicolons (;), square brackets ([]), or backticks (`).

openldap_db_password.description: Password for OpenLDAP database admin. Must not contain hyphens (-), single quotes ('), double quotes ("), at symbols (@), or backslashes (\).

openldap_config_username.description: Username for OpenLDAP configuration admin. Must not contain semicolons (;), square brackets ([]), or backticks (`).

openldap_config_password.description: Password for OpenLDAP configuration admin. Must not contain hyphens (-), single quotes ('), double quotes ("), at symbols (@), or backslashes (\).

openldap_monitor_password.description: Password for OpenLDAP monitor admin. Must not contain hyphens (-), single quotes ('), double quotes ("), at symbols (@), or backslashes (\).
